website_summaries.verdict: This freestanding fishing rod rack is compact and affordable, but it's known to be top-heavy.
pros: Assembly only takes a few minutes
Won't take up a lot of room in your home or garage
Simple to pop fishing rods in and out
cons: It can tip over if you don't balance out the rods

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews and researching others similar, I was afraid that this would not hold all our poles, or that appeared bigger than it was. Fear not .....It holds a lot and if you take the reals off holds more. (We did not take the reals off and still held over 12 poles with room for a few more.) And the assembly was easy! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: resmee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack
customer_reviews.text: It is a simple and effective fishing pole rack. You must put sticks on either side or the thing will tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Vkain

customer_reviews.title: " GREAT ROD AND REEL RACK ! "
customer_reviews.text: I have to say i was a little hesitant at first but after reading someone reviews i was convinced. I enjoy surf fishing so most of my gear is big so after all said and done i was pleased with my purchase. I included some photos and yeah its pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Does the job at the right price
customer_reviews.text: Now that my son has really gotten into fishing and has multiple rods and gear we wanted to give him something to help organize his fishing area. We put this rod holder next to a work table and it does the job. I didn't want to spend a lot of money because I wasn't sure he would even use it.....but he loves it and it protects his rods. I would certainly recommend this rod holder for the money. There are more sturdy and expensive rod holders available, but this isn't an item that will take a beating so I'm confident it will last.
customer_reviews.author: NewHopeBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I needed. Compact yet sturdy, and really does a great job fitting all the poles!
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Pipe

customer_reviews.title: Good for Dora the Explorer poles....
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because it looks just like this picture so no deception going on. Would be less for value to cost but again it's true to the picture. I'd place the value at $15, thin plastic, really cheap. NO WAY does it hold 16 rods unless it is just the poles without the reels. I have 4 fresh water poles that are 6' on the front and it's full. I spent the time to put it together so I'll keep it, I am a beginner fisherman with limited equipment so it's OK for me. Don't recommend for people who are seasoned as they'll be very disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Nice pole rack
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and it is holding four poles There was a parts list, but no assembly instructions. Not that assembly is complicated, but it would have been nice if there was a suggested assembly order. Despite the lack of instructions, it will suit my purposes perfectly, thus worthy of five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye249

customer_reviews.title: We got a returned item that was broken and not a new product.
customer_reviews.text: We missed being able to return this item because we waited until our beach house was finished. When we opened the box to assemble we found all the screws loose on the bottom of the box. We then looked at all the parts and discovered that someone had tried to assemble it and broke it. Obviously someone purchased the product, broke it, taped the box with scotch tape and returned it. Rather than receive a package that was new, we were sent one that had been returned. So we are out the money we spent on it and short a rod holder for our tackle room.
customer_reviews.author: SER

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great proce
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very particular with his fishing poles. I was skeptical at first about this product,but my husband loves it. It’s sturdy and doesn’t tip over when full
customer_reviews.author: Erica Mangers

customer_reviews.title: Good but it's not going to hold 16 for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I could give it 4.5 stars as I only have one issue with this holder. It's surprisingly sturdy and stable, but I just feel like I'm going to run into issues as I grow my collection. Some of the other reviews have stated it'll take some careful placement to get use of all 16 of these slots, and I don't want my reels getting banged up while I'm trying to move them around. Also I would make sure to not use a power drill while putting this together, it would be very easy to strip the holes and the plastic is soft enough to do it by hand.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store pool poles. Works great. I no longer have poles and nets all over the place. Everything stores nicely now
customer_reviews.author: San Antonio Rose

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The poles really stay put, and it's small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Martine

customer_reviews.title: Great temporary rod holder.
customer_reviews.text: This rod holder is iexpensive but it works quite well. It holds the rods but you can’t fill it up if they have reels on them because the positions are too close together. That’s OK though because it will hold six or eight rods comfortably. It’s weatherproof and easy to assemble so I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: CO364

customer_reviews.title: Good rack for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good rack for the money. Giving it 4 stars because the tabs that hold the 2 end pieces together are very easy to snap off while assembling it. The instructions say to be careful when snapping them together & they mean it. I purchased 2 of them & snapped all of the tabs on the first one I assembled. Even after realizing how easy they were to break I broke one of them on the second one I assembled. I drilled holes & placed tiny screws (no easy task) but the end result was 2 great rod racks that I can easily pick up & put in the bed of my pickup fully loaded with rods.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Casey

customer_reviews.title: Good at holding but there's no rolling.
customer_reviews.text: Good functionality, sturdy, easy to assemble, good price point, Shy of 5 stars because it does not "roll" as the name implies. Oh and make sure you balance the rods on both side or it might tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to organize my fishing equipment and purchased this. At first, I thought it would be flimsy when I was putting it together but it’s actually really sturdy. Also, the design of the holder is fish shaped which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: TristaC

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful when I bought these. I take students on a fishing trip every year and we have tried everything to hold the 30 fishing pole that we take out with us. Since this one was plastic I thought it would be a good choice. However they are just not that sturdy. My husband and I went to put these together and the first piece we tried to connect broke. They are light weight so they will be easy to load, but I am sure they will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: darcie

customer_reviews.title: Wealers fishing rod holder..
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a Christmas gift. My son says it works great, holds multiple size fishingrod’s. Took no time at all putting it together once he received the hardware and directions. Customer service was helpful with any issues we had.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jeannie Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to fill every slot with a pole.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's great! It's a little on the small side, and I found with our crappie poles and bass poles, you can only use every other insert for them to fit nicely. It was easy to put together, and for now, it will work fine. It doesn't take up very much space, so if you have around 8 poles and a net to store in a small area, it is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: KC shops online

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing gear stand
customer_reviews.text: This product is solid! Like others have said, as you put it together you wonder how sturdy it will be. After it is assembled the product is solid and a great stand for your gear. Holds a lot of poles in a small space. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SrB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Rack easily holds the sixteen rods and reels. The rods are easily placed and just as easily removed for use. The only potential problem is that it is so convenient to use that even small children can remove the rods, so it needs to be kept away from children. Otherwise it is a great product. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Jones

customer_reviews.title: This was a big disappointment. Its a nice rod holder for money if ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a big disappointment. Its a nice rod holder for money if just storing rods alone. But will not hold 16 rods with reels on them, Not enough room between rods for reels. It will hold five or six rods per side with reels but no way it will hold sixteen. ill have to reorder a larger pole holder to hold all my rod and reels combos. But it will make a good gift for my grandson to start with some of his smaller rods.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his birthday. He was excited for it! Took it out of the box and confident in its ability to be used so he burned the box. However, in putting it together he put together 2 pieces and it broke. So he gave up and threw the whole thing away. This is NOT worth buying. What a horrible and useless gift.
customer_reviews.author: E Rabideau

customer_reviews.title: perfect, basic and easy-to-use storage for your rods!
customer_reviews.text: Folks, this rod holder works just as described, so don't hesitate to order if you simply need easy, basic storage of your rods in your house, or the garage. It is very easy to take your equipment on or off...no trying to force the rod into clips that won't bend, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JDC33

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase easy to assemble very sturdy it is perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase easy to assemble very sturdy it is perfectly level as well. Very glad I bought this one. It will probably last for a very long time. Yes it made of plastic but better than metal or wood, plastic you won't have to worry about it rusting or worping due to humidity or the elements. no maintence needed. Thanks for everything.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Great holder but might be just a little too cramped
customer_reviews.text: Great holder but might be just a little too cramped. I can't get 16 on it. I staggered my spinning and casting reels but they don't vary in height enough to fill the rack. Reels just hit each other. Other than that it's great. Sturdy and nice looking. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. Even though it's plastic, it still feels durable and is very steady. It was easy to put together and my rod/reels look great in an actual stand instead of just leaned up against the wall. Depending on the size of your reels, it may not be able to hold the full advertised amount, but I'd say it could still easily handle 10 with reels. I'm really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Totally thought this was going to be heavier than what it was BUT it ended up being a great buy anyways! Does the job and doesn’t take up as much space as you would think! Deff looks better!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: it looks good in the corner so if anyone want to have ...
customer_reviews.text: The screws are hard to tighten you have to put some hand strength into it but other then that it’s holding my 2 nets, pushpole, paddles, 4 rods, it looks good in the corner so if anyone want to have a little style while hold a few items then this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K. Hawke

customer_reviews.title: The two bottom pieces for the poles to rest on ...
customer_reviews.text: The two bottom pieces for the poles to rest on were no where in the box and all the screws were not in the box as wel!! if they would have sent everything I would say it’s worth to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fairly decent rod holder for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad for the money, plastic is a little on the cheap side. Moderately sturdy. Instructions are poor at best but you can get the idea if you’ve put a lot of stuff together before.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Depeau

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I totally thought it would be bigger Even off the measurements i was lead to believe the shelves would be further apart
customer_reviews.author: Benita menendez

customer_reviews.title: He said it was pretty hard to put together but once done
customer_reviews.text: Again--this is for my Dad, He said it was pretty hard to put together but once done, he was very pleased Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Martin Clearman

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This is a poorly designed, lightweight plastic piece of crap. It could not handle salt water poles without tipping over and the design is flawed so bigger rods tip over. Don't Do IT!
customer_reviews.author: Swez

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the strongest thing in the world but holds a full rack of rods like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: Try it you'll like it
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my garage perfectly, it is just plastic but what isn't anymore. Easy to assemble and move around. I had to put some of the bigger rods on opposite sides for balance.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Salvagni

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking and Stable
customer_reviews.text: This was a present to an 85 year old man with disabilities, he was easily able to assemble it on his own and loves it, he is using it on his dock for rod storage. Looks great, easy to assemble and works well. It did blow over with 30 mph winds once, but in general, very stable and sturdy rod holder.
customer_reviews.author: Priests

customer_reviews.title: Fishing rod holder
customer_reviews.text: One of those rare products that you get your money's worth and then some. Makes a great gift for an outdoor person.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised! Works great and fits plenty of rods with the reels
customer_reviews.author: Snowman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well built. I have 12 freshwater rods and reels presently and it could handle a few more easily. I assembled top section and then bottom section separately. Then had my son help me attach the two sections together on connection pegs in middle with screws (could have done by self, but less chance of breaking connector pegs with assistance.). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bach

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It helped make the garage very neat and clean and made a lot more pace for other things
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, but not sturdy. Broke off the connecting tabs (too much force). Was able to use screws and it’s holding.
customer_reviews.author: MartaG

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works great after we found some screws to put in it since they were missing from the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Product
customer_reviews.text: To small to hold 16 of my rods & reels ! At the most it would only hold 8 of my rods & reels
customer_reviews.author: Reasonable#1

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for hubby, and he loves it. It holds all his fishing rod.
customer_reviews.author: diana nazario

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool Rack.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. So cute. We use in our cabin where my sweetie goes fishing most. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic garbage! Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of plastic garbage. The two halves would not fit together, upon applying pressure it broke, then into pieces.....resulting in cutting my leg and finger......
customer_reviews.author: mkeith830

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble and holds everything (within reason)
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was quite easy to assemble, my three year old helped me. Seems pretty sturdy, only loaded with 7-8 rods/reels and nothing huge like nets or saltwater rods.
customer_reviews.author: Termite

customer_reviews.title: Put together by myself easily; ) because it was meant to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my boyfriend. Put together by myself easily ;) because it was meant to be a surprise. Looks good and does the job! Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT IT TO USE TO HOLD MY FLAGS THAT ARE ON FISHING POLES. IT WORK PREFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Ray L

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for $$
customer_reviews.text: Never done a review but this was worth it...rod holders are a pain and u want a good one or u just waist money...I got this on a discount from damaged box..took the risk and it paid off!! Hold 12 spinning rods easy, and it's so easy to move and assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks cool with the fish on the ends, perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Cute fishing pole holder
customer_reviews.text: This was a very simple to assemble fishing pole rack, looks very cute and very functional. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased for the price. Does the job.....only have four rods with spinning reels. I would think four more is capacity.
customer_reviews.author: SilverOnes

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for what it’s worth.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy plastic, horrible directions but still easy to put together. I would spend a few dollars more to get something made of wood if I need to buy another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rhotrod25

customer_reviews.title: very easy to break during assembly! light r&r only!
customer_reviews.text: A little too flimsy. Does not like to hold larger rods and reels
customer_reviews.author: blowe2000

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Completely unusable Ordered damaged box with cosmetic issues Multiple pieces broken Even if was all original would not purchase again. Way to cheap and fragile for actual use. Basically paid for a bag of screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loves this rod holder. He’s new into the fishing scene and this is exactly what he needed to keep all of his poles in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Good stand for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really like this stand. Light weight, easy to put together. Only exception is can't fit 16 rod&reels easily. Not enough space for reels side by side without getting tangled. However, its serving my purpose well with less rods.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C

customer_reviews.title: It's a good value
customer_reviews.text: It's a good value and a great way to organize your fishing gear.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my dad for part of his Father's Day gift and it came with no hardware to put it together! Very disappointed!!! Hope they can send me the screws to put it together!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erick Dasilva

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Work great i have 2 of them but the tabs that hold the side pieces together are cheap molded plastic and can break
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad, he said its good quality abd he likes it
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I needed it to save my rods from being stacked in the garage. It has worked well so far.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: ... the cheap side but in all honesty it works great. Now i dont have fishing poles throughout my ...
customer_reviews.text: a bit on the cheap side but in all honesty it works great. Now i dont have fishing poles throughout my house.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Robello

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: seems flimsy but really is not. Easy to put together, stable with rods/reels in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Peters

customer_reviews.title: I do like the look of it once assembled
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit flimsy overall, but the quality matches the price point. I do like the look of it once assembled. It is a bit top heavy as others have mentioned. I added a bit of weight to the bottom and it seemed to help quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: B. S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together... works great, and like the fish theme on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Will Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Product works good for my purposes. Holds quite a bit in a small compact area.
customer_reviews.author: Lenna Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Everything is in plastic material.
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product. The material is plastic but not strong enough to last. When I was assembling the rack, one of the stand broke. I will give 0 star to this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: santiago franco

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It works as described and looks pretty rad in doing so. The spacing of the rod slots is awfully snug, so you may have reservations if you want to baby your rods as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love this rack. Bought it for my son and he loves it too. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: tdrbat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good but can't fit a pole in every spot with reels attached.
customer_reviews.author: BigGameDale

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find everything
customer_reviews.text: Won't hold as many as it claims if the rods have reels on them but definitely nice to keep them organized
customer_reviews.author: Hannah harshbarger

customer_reviews.title: Father’s Day
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect Father’s Day gift this year! Grab a drill, took me about 5 minutes to assemble. Looks small at first but it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: envy09

customer_reviews.title: All plastic, good for salt water areas
customer_reviews.text: All plastic which is good for outdoor salt water areas. would not leave in sun. Moved to storage when not in use for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Rick  NE Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Works great and my rods are now more organised in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and my rods are now more organised in my garage. I will buy another one for my son to organise his garage
customer_reviews.author: Bridget H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Easy to put together and is sturdy! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Son. He loved the look & it holds most of his fishing rods. I might be buying him a second one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Mills-Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Our garage looks so much better with everything together! Easy to get items in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny wainwright

customer_reviews.title: This fishing pole stand is seriously awesome. I only wish the sides were of a ...
customer_reviews.text: This fishing pole stand is seriously awesome. I only wish the sides were of a little tougher material. I have had this for months now and its held up, looks great in our game room and serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Mcclenahan

customer_reviews.title: 12 max
customer_reviews.text: My dad likes it, but you can only put about 12 on it with reels. Not 18..
customer_reviews.author: Blake K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it as described holds all my fishing polls, looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Fa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little top heavy but o.k. sometimes a little tight between rods with reels especially spinning reels.
customer_reviews.author: GRUMMAN 1

customer_reviews.title: Stacks everything!
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily and everything we wanted to stack in it like fishing poles, golf putters, marshmallow roasting sticks, etc. stayed put and looked organized!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the screened in back porch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the screened in back porch. Holds plenty of rods and nets without taking up much space. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: It’s compact, rods are quite close to each other allowing fish hooks to snag
customer_reviews.text: The fishing rack allowed 90% of the fishing rods to free stand

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Kind of lightweight and those tiny screws are difficult to work with. We

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great Price, easy to assemble ( 14 year old put it together). Grandson was thrilled with this gift.

customer_reviews.title: I like the design of it
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of it. Looks cool but it could be a little heavier to make it more sturdier.

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son , Smaller than what I expected but it does the job. Easy to assemble. Sturdy and looks nice . Poles fit fine .

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for small fresh water rods lacks enough space for ocean rods

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy, perfect to save space and looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly outstanding product! It is very sturdy, perfect to save space and looks fantastic. I would rate it with 10 stars and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie  Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, a bit lite but does the job. Currently have two 7' rods and two 6' rods in it. Room for at least two more. Makes wash down after a day in saltwater easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Am very impressed with this item for only $20. It's stronger than it looks and holds fishing poles great of all sizes

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.  Won't rust.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Satisfied. In shore garage so I won't have to worry about rust, since it's all plastic.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It came in and the attachments were broken. And the plastic rack is very wobbly.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s very sturdy for a plastic rack, and easy to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is hard plastic, it feels well-made. It went together easily and all of my rod and reels fit.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Sturdy and foes the job. !!️!!️!!️!!️!!️

product_meta.title: Wealers 16 Fishing Rod Holder Storage Rack Fishing Pole Stand Garage Organizer Space Saver, Designed to Holds Any Type Rod Hiking Sticks Will Keep It Steady
feature_bullets: MULTIPURPOSE: The organizer rack offers storage on both sides, and holds up to hold 16 rods or poles simultaneously. It secures and protects your pool cue sticks, fishing nets, ski poles, croquet poles, golf clubs, fishing rods and more.

ANTI-WEAR: Weatherproof frame is made with quality plastic and designed exclusively to endure the elements. Perfect for garage and pool storage, parts are rot and corrosion resistant and the stand retains its beauty over the time.

SPACE SAVER | ORGANIZATION: Designed with a sturdy base, it holds all your poles and reels in one convenient, easy to reach and highly visible spot, that provides you with simplified, hassle free storage.

EASY MAINTENACE: The products non-abrasive surface cleans easily with mild soap and water, and the stand has a high resistance to mold and mildew. Assembled dimensions:44cm x 25cm x 80cm and includes instruction manual.

STURDY BASE | SOLID DESIGN: Features an extra secure base that holds your equipment upright and neatly organized. Constructed with durable parts that offer you a quality product with a healthy lifespan.
